name: Mpaxs
short_description: Mpaxs provides a simple abstraction for executing Callables and Runnables either locally within the same Virtual Machine, on the same host via RMI, or on remote machines, also via RMI. It supports launching of new compute hosts via an extensible API, currently featuring local compute host launching and grid compute host launching using the DRMAA API.
summary: Transparent Local and Remote Parallelization for Java
